SourceString: Complete <b>{chaptername}</> with this mastery combination to unlock.
Unlock badges by completing chapters of the game\'s <b>fated quests</> with the corresponding mastery combinations. This progress is shared across all your characters.
<b>High-rarity items</> you\'ve collected in the game are showcased here. This collection is shared across all your characters.
Complete <b>{chaptername}</> with this mastery only to unlock.
Complete <b>{chaptername}</> without any mastery to unlock.
